Despite rapidly increasing CO2, population, and fossil fuel use, the Earth had a thirty-year cooling period from 1940‚Äôs to the 1970‚Äôs. The cooling was significant enough that we were warned on the first Earth Day in 1970 that a catastrophic ice age was coming.

This is the real source of CLIMATE CHANGE.  Volcanoes (700 deg F) have been erupting all over the world since 2018.  Moreover, there are SUPERVOLCANOES (2000 deg F) underground much closer to the Earth's surface than before.  

There is no  way that 4 carbon dioxide molecules per 10,000 air molecules can trap enough heat to compete with all the volcanoes and supervolcanoes around the world.  Moreover, Greenhouse Effect in the atmosphere is dominated by CLOUDS, with HUMIDITY a weaker secondary effect.

One of the most damaging ways that Al Gore's world leadership for the past few decades has HARMED SCIENCE is that organizations like NASA that used to be true leaders of science are POLITICIZED.  NASA and several other purported science organizations claim that SATELLITES have been measuring carbon dioxide infrared absorption for decades, based on the wavelength range (spectrum) being absorbed.  But the old CRC handbook (starting on page 433) told us BOTH carbon dioxide and water vapor absorb strongly across the infrared spectrum.  The difference is still that there are ONLY 4 carbon dioxide molecules per 10,000 air molecules in the atmosphere.  Given that clouds can block satellite view of the Earth's surface and that the satellite sees more ocean than not when it orbits the Earth, there is NO WAY to eliminate water while isolating the "dominance" of carbon dioxide gas.  Those satellites measure infrared absorption of WATER -- liquid, solid and gaseous.

For everyone who says "Scientists were predicting global cooling in the 1970's", there is one big problem... there will always be scientists making claims that are outside of the scientific consensus. You need to stop listening to individual scientists who are making these outlier claims and ask what is/was the scientific consensus. There was never a scientific consensus back in the 1970's that an ice age was coming or that the Earth was cooling. The scientific consensus then and now was that CO2 causes warming. 

Moral of the story... stop cherry picking individual scientists who voice opinions that resonate with what you want to believe, and seek out what the majority of mainstream scientists agree upon.
